name: My Friend the Reaper - Dodgeball
description:
Instructions:

Hit the balls to get a highscore! Getting enough hits within a certain time, spawns a shield, combos will activate slow motion.

Fullscreen recommended. Feedback is much appreciated!

This is just a minigame, the main game can be found here: https://kaktuspirat.itch.io/my-friend-the-reaper

Controls:

Mouse and keyboard: 

MoveWASDAttackLeft mouse buttonBowRight mouse buttonDashSpace

Xbox Controller:

Move Left StickAttackABow BDash RT
